## Keynote Speakers

![](keynotepic.png){fig-align="center"}

This year's keynote speakers include a diverse group of global mental health leaders and researchers: Kathleen Sikkema, Florence Jaguga, and Emily Cherenack.

## Poster Presentations

![](poster.png){fig-align="center"}

Poster presentations will provide students, organizations, and researchers a chance to share their work and explore collaborations with others. All accepted presenters will have the opportunity to engage with conference attendees during a dedicated poster session. Submissions are open to individuals from Duke and and its affiliates!

## Faculty Research Spotlights

![Photo credit: Kacey Godwin](eve_panel.png){fig-align="center"}

This conference session will spotlight the innovative work of faculty members from across Duke University. Presentations will cover a range of global topics that will provide valuable insights into the intersections of culture, mental health, and healing across various global contexts.
